functions.name: workspace_marketplace_apps_access_restricted
functions.description: Restricts access to marketplace apps in workspace.

functions.name: workspace_less_secure_app_access_disabled
functions.description: Disables less secure app access in workspace.

functions.name: appengine_environment_automatic_updates_enabled
functions.description: Checks if automatic updates are enabled for appengine environment.

functions.name: app_engine_application_automatic_updates_enabled
functions.description: Checks if automatic updates are enabled for app engine application.

functions.name: app_engine_application_https_enforced
functions.description: Checks if HTTPS is enforced for app engine application.

notes: All functions are based on GCP APPENGINE API.
Ensure proper IAM permissions are configured.
Consider regional vs global service differences.
Implement appropriate retry logic for API calls.
